body.subject: Epic 28 deployment cancelled - project conservation
body.summary: Project conservation initiated. All shared infrastructure containers stopped. Deployment status changed to CANCELLED. Quality approval (release_gate: true) remains valid - deployment can be resumed when project is reactivated. All quality gates passed, all test evidence preserved.
key_points: All quality gates passed, test evidence preserved
Deployment can be resumed when project is reactivated
body.action_needed: Deployment cancelled due to project conservation. Quality approval remains valid. When project is reactivated, quality engineer can verify that all quality gates still pass before resuming deployment.
